seo.title: TarjetaGratis - Personalized digital invitations for birthdays
seo.description: Create free animated cards for children's birthdays with your style. Choose magical backgrounds, colors, texts, and visual effects. Share them via WhatsApp or Telegram.
seo.keywords: digital cards, birthday, kids invitations, animated cards, free cards, React

bienvenida_subtitulo: Create personalized digital invitations for birthdays and special events easily and for free. Choose a template, edit the details, generate the code, and share your invitation instantly. You can also customize it to make it unique.
